Name: d_tokki
Text: Somewhat reserved; shy, but likes people.

Name: d_tokki
Text: An intelligent beluga whale born on a sea planet.

Name: d_tokki
Text: In love with her researcher, "Dr. Yoshikado".

Name: d_tokki
Text: Traumatized by accidentally swallowing a goldfish.

Name: d_tokki
Text: Perfect hearing; can sense movement around her.

Name: d_tokki
Text: Dreams of somehow becoming human.

Name: d_tokki

Name: t_aisatu
Text:
I, um... My name is {0}.
I'm still getting the hang of things, but I'll do my best.

Name: t_suspect
Text:
When I hear {0}'s voice, my water clouds up...
I wonder why that happens...?

Name: t_suspect
Text:
Um, {0} keeps taking over the conversation.
I'd like to hear from other people, too.

Name: t_suspect
Text:
So, everyone seems to trust {0}... but...
That feels, um... sort of weird...

Name: t_suspect
Text:
So, uh... I've been thinking...
I wonder why {0} doesn't seem to, uh... speak up...?

Name: t_suspect
Text:
I did some calculations.
And it seems like {0} is acting, uh... kinda strange...

Name: t_suspect
Text:
I feel like there's something weird about {0}...
Like maybe something's bothering them...?

Name: t_suspect
Text:
So, I, um...
I think there's something strange about {0}.
So... I'm sorry.

Name: t_suspect
Text:
Something is bothering me about {0}.
I mean, you know... {1}.
{1} disappeared, so...

Name: t_suspect_r
Text:
Squeak...
{0} doesn't seem to be OK after all...

Name: t_suspect_r
Text:
{0}! {0}!
If you keep talking, then nobody else can, {0}...

Name: t_suspect_r
Text:
I sort of feel like, if we keep trusting {0}...
Then it, um, may not end so well...

Name: t_suspect_r
Text: Um... I'd like to hear more from {0}...

Name: t_suspect_r
Text:
I feel like {0} is OK, but...
I did some thinking, and maybe {0} is, like, not OK...?

Name: t_suspect_r
Text:
I thought {0} seemed alright, but...
Now, I feel maybe I was wrong...?

Name: t_suspect_add
Text:
{0}, does your stomach hurt? No...?
It looks like something's bothering you...

Name: t_suspect_t0
Text:
I, too, um...
I thought, maybe, uh... {0} wasn't so, um... good.

Name: t_suspect_t0
Text: Actually, I, um... I felt the same way.

Name: t_suspect_t0
Text:
Um, excuse me, {0}... Uh...
There's something that's sort of, uh, bothering me...

Name: t_suspect_t0
Text: Oh, so {0} is sort of, uh... peculiar, right?

Name: t_suspect_t0
Text:
I'll try doing some calculations myself...
Yeah, same here. {0} seems off...

Name: t_suspect_t0
Text:
I feel better knowing that someone else agrees.
{0} has been giving me strange vibes, too...

Name: t_suspect_t0
Text: Yes. {0} is, um... A little suspicious...

Name: t_suspect_t1
Text:
So, um... uh...
I also kinda think there's something off about {0}...

Name: t_suspect_t1
Text: Um, I'd kinda like to hear more from people apart from {0}, too...

Name: t_suspect_t1
Text: Hm... Now that I think about it, I sort of agree...

Name: t_suspect_t1
Text:
{0}, I think you should speak up a little more.
Then, nobody would think you're, uh, you know... "{0} is kinda weird"...

Name: t_suspect_t1
Text: Huh? Oh, yeah, huh...

Name: t_suspect_t1
Text:
I was kinda worried whether {0} was OK...
Looks like, maybe not...

Name: t_suspected0
Text: *SQUEAK*...

Name: t_suspected0
Text: I, uh... um... yeah...

Name: t_hanron0
Text:
It's OK, {0}.
{0}, I think you're just fine.

Name: t_hanron0
Text:
*Squeak*... {1}.
I think you're worrying a bit too much about {0}.

Name: t_hanron1
Text:
{0} seems a bit weird, but...
Not necessarily in a bad way, you know?

Name: t_hanron_t0
Text: I haven't found anything strange about {0}.

Name: t_hanron_t1
Text: If {2} says so, then I'm sure {0} is just fine.

Name: t_trust
Text:
I, um... I like the sound of {0}.
Hearing it sort of makes me happy.

Name: t_trust
Text:
Um, the probability of {0} being OK is pretty high...
So, I'm pretty sure {0} is safe!

Name: t_trust
Text:
I know...
{0} isn't the kind of person who's capable of cruelty.

Name: t_trust_r
Text:
I want to offer my help to {0}.
If {0} were to go away, I'd be really upset...

Name: t_trust_r
Text:
I did the calculations, and I don't think anything's wrong with {0}.
I'm pretty sure we're OK.

Name: t_trust_r
Text: I just can't believe that {0} would do anything horrible.

Name: t_trust_t0
Text: That's right! {0} is a good person!

Name: t_trust_t1
Text:
Aah...
I'm starting to think that {0} is alright!

Name: t_trusted0
Text: *Squeak squeak!* Thank you for trusting me!

Name: t_thanron0
Text:
But... There's something that bothers me about {0}.
I'm worried...

Name: t_thanron1
Text:
Is everything... OK?
I'm starting to get worried...

Name: t_thanron_t0
Text: Yeah, um... I'm also starting to think something's strange about {0}...

Name: t_thanron_t1
Text: I, um... I'm a little bit worried...

Name: t_hosho
Text:
Ah... I figured it out!
{0} is the real {1}!

Name: t_hosho
Text:
I figured it out! {0} is human.
Definitely not Gnosia.

Name: t_hosho_enemy
Text:
Um... I realized something.
{0} isn't the {1}…

Name: t_hosho_enemy
Text:
{0} is a {1}.
I figured it out, but I sort of wish I hadn't...

Name: t_hosho_enemy
Text:
Oh, hey... I figured it out!
So, {0} is the {1}, right?

Name: t_hosho_enemy
Text:
Ah, I figured it out! But...
What exactly is wrong with... {0}?
Not feeling well, or maybe {1}...?

Name: t_hosho_enemy
Text:
Huh...? {0}'s comments are sort of... uneven.
So it looks like {0} is the one who's off...

Name: t_hosho_enemy
Text:
{0} isn't Gnosia, but...
Those comments just don't make sense...

Name: t_hosho_miss
Text:
Oh... really? Um...
I'm sorry, I don't see how that could be...

Name: t_hosho_miss
Text:
Um, that may be so, but...
{0}, why are you repeating things...?

Name: t_hosho_get
Text:
Oh wow... Thank you, {0}!
Now maybe everyone will trust me...

Name: t_hosho_get
Text: Oh no... I messed up...

Name: t_tohyo_go
Text: It's quiet... Like under the water...

Name: t_tohyo_mae
Text: Oh hey, it's time to vote...

Name: t_tohyo_sai
Text:
That didn't work...
Um... I guess we have to vote one more time?

Name: t_shokei
Text:
It looks like I'm getting sent off to cold sleep.
I like the cold, so I'll be OK.

Name: t_shokei
Text:
OK, I'm off to cold sleep.
Um... Thank you for talking to me so much.

Name: t_wakare
Text: {0}... It'll be lonely without you...

Name: t_karare
Text:
*Squeak*... {0}?
Um, please wait... Please?
I want to write out a goodbye to everyone...

Name: t_imjinro
Text:
I didn't want to become {0}.
But, well, now I am {0}, so...

Name: t_shori
Text:
{0} is gone...
It's strange... So many things are strange...

Name: t_tohyo_kurikaeshi
Text: Once again, it didn't work out... What do we do?

Name: t_tohyo_jeno
Text:
{0}.
For cold sleep, I mean.
I think it's better than being killed...

Name: t_tohyo_alive
Text: Well, how about nobody goes into cold sleep...?

Name: t_tohyo_jeno_ok
Text:
I recommend cold sleep.
It's chilly and comfortable.

Name: t_tohyo_jeno_ng
Text:
So everyone will be gone...
I'm a little scared...

Name: t_tohyo_alive_ok
Text: I agree with skipping cold sleep.

Name: t_tohyo_alive_ng
Text:
So nobody goes off to cold sleep...?
I think that's dangerous.

Name: t_tohyo_jeno_kettei
Text:
{0}.
I'll start cold sleep preparations.
Stay calm, and wait a moment, OK?

Name: t_tohyo_alive_kettei
Text:
*Squeak*... Really...? Yay...!
I'm glad nobody's going away.

Name: t_tohyo_hitei
Text:
Oh no...
I guess we have to find another way to do this...

Name: t_tohyo_dame
Text:
Oh... It's time to go back to our rooms.
I have to change my water.

Name: t_co
Text: dammy

Name: t_co
Text:
Um, actually... I'm the {0}...
I may be able to help find the Gnosia.

Name: t_co
Text:
I'm able to use the medical equipment.
So I can examine people in cold sleep.
I can tell if they're Gnosia or not.

Name: t_co
Text:
I'm a {0}.
I hope to be able to protect everyone...

Name: t_co
Text:
So, you become Gnosia when you get shocked, right...?
I actually can't leave this ship...
So I couldn't have been shocked.

Name: t_co
Text: dammy

Name: t_co
Text: dammy

Name: t_co
Text: dammy

Name: t_co
Text: dammy

Text: dammy

Text:
Actually, um... I'm the {0}.
And I found out that {1} is Gnosia, and I don't know what to do...

Name: t_co_find
Text:
I'm the {0}, so I examined those put into cold sleep...
And it turns out that {1} was Gnosia.

Text: dammy

Text: dammy

Text: dammy

Name: t_co_taiko
Text:
*SQUEAK!* Excuse me...
But I'm the {0}.

Name: t_co_taiko
Text:
Um, I hope you can all believe me, but...
The Doctor isn't {1}.
It's me.

Name: t_co_taiko
Text: dammy

Name: t_co_taiko
Text:
It's true that {1} was on the ship.
I've been here the whole time, so, um...
I went around checking if anyone was here.

Name: t_co_taiko
Text: dammy

Name: t_co_taiko
Text: dammy

Name: t_co_taiko
Text: dammy

Text: dammy

Name: t_co_req
Text:
{0}!
Is the {0} here?

Name: t_co_after
Text:
{1}, you're the {0}?
Thank you for stepping forward.

Name: t_co_after
Text:
That's, um... It doesn't make sense.
There's only supposed to be one {0}...

Name: t_co_after
Text:
*Squeak*... Something isn't right here.
There's only supposed to be one {0}...

Name: t_uranai_o
Text: Well, I... tried to look into it, but...

Name: t_uranai_s
Text: I did some research...

Name: t_uranai_b
Text: Uh, I actually looked into it, too... Um...

Name: t_uranai_f
Text: {1} was alright. Negative for {0}.

Name: t_uranai_n
Text: I, uh, wasn't sure who to check out...

Name: t_reibai_s
Text: I used the medical equipment to do an examinaton, and...

Name: t_reibai_f
Text: {1} went into cold sleep, but... They weren't {0}.

Name: t_reibai_ff
Text: {1}. None of them were {0}...

Name: t_houkoku_s
Text: My examination gave the same results.

Name: t_houkoku_w
Text: Really? My results were different.

Name: t_okuyami
Text:
{0}'s sound...
It's gone. I can't hear it...

Name: t_okuyami_n
Text: Ah...! Nobody went missing!

Name: t_okuyami_f
Text:
{0}?
So two people disappeared...
Was one of them... a bug...?

Name: t_houkoku_req
Text: I'd like to hear your reports...

Name: t_houkoku_not
Text:
So, um... is that all the reports?
Hm... I feel like something's missing...

Name: t_skill_sayNingen
Text:
*Squeak*...
Can... can I call myself "human"?
Well, I'm certainly not Gnosia, at least.

Name: t_skill_sayNingen
Text:
*Squeak*... I...
I feel like something bad's going to happen, so I'd rather not.

Name: t_skill_zatsudan
Text:
Food...
I really want to eat some raw fish...

Name: t_skill_zatsudan
Text:
Um, we're talking about people we like?
I'd... really like to see the professor who created me again...

Name: t_skill_zatsudan
Text:
When I request food, LeVi always suggests mammal steak...
That's... kind of creepy to me...

Name: t_skill_zatsudan
Text:
Um, {0}...
I feel like, maybe, right now...
We should be talking about the Gnosia...

Name: t_skill_roller
Text:
So, there's only one real {0}, right?
Something's wrong, so we should send everyone to cold sleep...

Name: t_skill_roller
Text:
Vote for everyone who claimed to be the {0}? But...
Um, OK... It looks like that's the way to go.

Name: t_skill_roller
Text:
Everyone who claimed to be the {0}, they'll be gone...
I don't like that...

Name: t_skill_roller
Text:
Yeah, I'm against it, too.
I want the {0} to stay with us...

Name: t_skill_roller
Text:
I'm happy someone agrees.
They will probably get more votes, but...
I just hope this works out for us...

Name: t_skill_roller
Text:
Um, I just thought it might help...
It's not that everyone has to vote for them.
Please, just forget about it...

Name: t_skill_roller
Text:
Um, so, there's only one real {0}, so...
Maybe we should put everyone claiming to be {0} in cold sleep.

Name: t_skill_doTohyo
Text:
*Squeak*... {1}, that's incorrect.
The Engineer didn't say anything like that.

Name: t_skill_doTohyo
Text:
Yeah...
I agree with {1}.

Name: t_skill_doTohyo
Text:
I'm fine with cold sleep, but...
I'm a little worried things may go wrong...

Name: t_skill_doTohyo
Text:
I, um... I don't want to do this.
I want to hear more from {0}.

Name: t_skill_doTohyo
Text: I'd be so lonely if {0} went away...

Name: t_skill_dontTohyo
Text:
Um, I did a bunch of calculations, and...
I don't think {0} should be put into cold sleep tonight.

Name: t_skill_dontTohyo
Text:
Yeah, I agree.
I don't think we should vote for {0}, either.

Name: t_skill_dontTohyo
Text:
I, um...
I don't think we should decide not to vote for {0}...

Name: t_skill_dontTohyo
Text:
I agree.
I don't think we should stop from voting for whom they want.

Name: t_skill_kyoryoku
Text:
*Squeak*! Really? Do you mean it?
Let's make our way through this together, {0}!

Name: t_skill_kyoryoku
Text:
I'm really happy you'd ask me.
But... I can't.
I wouldn't want anything to happen to you because of me, {0}.

Name: t_skill_h_dojo
Text: *Squeeaak*...

Name: t_skill_h_help
Text:
I... um... I'm sorry.
I'm still sort of undecided, so...

Name: t_skill_dogeza
Text:
*Squeak*... Sorry...
Um, what should we do...?

Name: t_personal
Text: I, um... I'm sorry...

Name: t_personal
Text:
{0}, you, uh...
I guess you did what you could...?

Name: t_personal
Text:
I'm not like you, {0}...
But I'd like to try and get along.

Name: t_personal
Text:
{0}, so you weren't Gnosia after all.
*Squeak!* Neither am I!

Name: t_personal
Text:
Oh, {0}, look! Look!
I changed my water! Does it look better now?

Name: t_personal
Text:
Oh, {0}, look! Look!
I polished my helmet to make it look nicer!

Name: t_personal
Text:
I'd like to talk with you more, {0}.
So... {0}, I hope there's nothing wrong with you...

Name: t_personal
Text:
*Squeak!* {0}!
{0}, I'd like to talk to you.

Name: t_personal
Text:
{0}, I want to trust you more.
Meaning, um... yeah... I can't really trust you just yet...

Name: t_personal
Text:
I'm Gnosia, so...
*Squeak squeak!* Same as you, {0}!

Name: t_personal
Text:
{0}! {0}!
*SQUEAK SQUEEAAK!* I'm... I'm so happy...

Name: t_personal
Text:
I'm kinda *SQUEEAAK*, so, you know...
If {0} was to *KEEEEE* and *SKWEEE* then I'd *SQUEEEAAAK*.

Name: t_personal
Text:
{0}, that, uh... um...
You tried your best, I guess.

Name: t_personal
Text:
*SQUEAK!* {0}, you came!
Let's party tonight!

Name: t_personal
Text:
{0}, you don't look so well...
I'm a bit worried...

Name: t_personal
Text:
{0}... Is something wrong?
I don't, um, know what to do...

Name: t_personal
Text:
Can I talk, too? Really?
Wow, OK, I'll do my best!

Name: t_personal
Text:
Um... {0}...
I, uh... I've realized something...

Name: t_personal
Text:
{1} is lying.
I could tell by the sound when we were all talking.

Name: t_personal
Text:
I hope I'm wrong, but...
Hm... *SQUEAK*

Name: t_personal
Text:
{1} seemed kind of, off...
I hope this is OK...

Name: t_personal
Text:
But {0}...
I appreciated you listening to me earlier.
I wanted to thank you for that.

Name: t_personal
Text:
Ah, {0}!
Hey, I, um... kinda wanted to, um... talk to you...

Name: t_personal
Text:
With the Gnosia around somewhere...
I don't know just who's OK...

Name: t_personal
Text:
So, *SQUEAK*!
I want to trust you, {0}.
And I hope we can get through this together...

Name: t_personal
Text:
Ah...!
Thank you, {0}!

Name: t_personal
Text:
Would you like to eat dinner together tonight?
Tonight I'm having a fish festival!

Name: t_personal
Text:
Um... I'm sorry...
For saying weird stuff like that...

Name: t_personal
Text:
But... Hehehe...
Thank you for listening to me!

Name: t_personal
Text:
{0}! {0}!
I did some calculations to figure out what we should do.

Name: t_personal
Text:
And, well...
Tonight, I think we should eliminate {1}.

Name: t_personal
Text:
If we do that, everyone should be OK.
All the Gnosia are our dear friends, so...

Name: t_personal
Text:
(*Squeak!* We did it, {0}!
　Now we can rest a bit easier.)

Name: t_personal
Text: Wow, we won...

Name: t_personal
Text:
You know...
{0}, since you were here with me, I...
I feel I was able to try harder than ever!

Name: t_personal
Text:
But, I'm glad we won!
Now we can finally rest easy!

Name: t_personal
Text:
The Gnosia have all been put to rest, so...
*Squeak!* We're in the clear now!

Name: t_personal
Text:
Nobody else has to disappear now.
It's finally over...

Name: t_personal
Text:
Um...
The Gnosia, they ARE all at rest now, right...?

Name: t_personal
Text:
That means that you're not, uh, "strange", right, {0}?
That's good!

Name: t_personal
Text:
So, should we have, like, a party or something?
I'll make a fish cake!

Name: t_personal
Text:
But, you know...
I hope we can become friends with the Gnosia at some point, too...

Name: t_personal
Text:
OK, so, we have the same numbers as the humans now, so...
Hey, everything is gonna be OK!

Name: t_personal
Text:
Wow... Yay!
We won!

Name: t_personal
Text:
Ever since I became Gnosia...
I was under so much pressure to keep lying...

Name: t_personal
Text:
So I'm glad we've finally won.
Thank you so much, {0}!

Name: t_personal
Text:
Finally...
I'd been so worried.
I didn't want to cause trouble for my Gnosia friends...

Name: t_personal
Text:
So, *SQUEAK!*
I'm just so happy now!

Name: t_personal
Text:
{0}!
I, um, want to tell you something, {0}...

Name: t_personal
Text:
I'd been keeping it a secret this whole time.
Actually, I, uh...

Name: t_personal
Text:
I'm Gnosia!
Hehehe... I can finally get that off my chest!

Name: t_personal
Text:
Um... {0}...
I'm actually a Bug.

Name: t_personal
Text:
But I felt like I had to try my best to survive.
It may not work out, but I wanted to live.

Name: t_personal
Text:
I'm sorry, {0}.
And thank you for everything.

Name: t_personal
Text:
Um, are you, possibly...
{0}, are you an AC Follower?

Name: t_personal
Text:
Wow...
I'm actually Gnosia myself!
Hehehe, I guess we're friends!

Name: t_personal
Text:
*Squeak!* {0}!
Thanks for all your help!

Name: t_temp
Text:
High Logic & Charm; other skills are somewhat low.
She tends to lean on logic, but often shows a
very kind side.
